title: Best of the Program | 6/2/22
description:
Glenn calls out the New York Times for mixing up the Great Reset and replacement theory in an attempted hit piece against Glenn and TheBlaze. Glenn goes through the three pillars it takes to transform America and how the Biden administration is implementing them to gear up for a national climate emergency power-grab. Glenn and Stu discuss the repercussions of loan forgiveness when inflation is out of control. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
